EntitySets.Name: CurriculumStatuses
EntitySets.Description: Collection of curriculum status search results for users

EntitySets.Name: CurriculumItemStatuses
EntitySets.Description: Collection of curriculum item status search results

Properties.Name: statusID
Properties.Description: Unique identifier for the curriculum status

Properties.Name: curriculumID
Properties.Description: Unique identifier for the curriculum

Properties.Name: studentID
Properties.Description: Unique ID of the student/user

Properties.Name: title
Properties.Description: Title of the curriculum

Properties.Name: enrollmentStatus
Properties.Description: Enrollment status in the curriculum

Properties.Name: completionStatus
Properties.Description: Completion status of the curriculum

Properties.Name: progressPercentage
Properties.Description: Progress percentage in the curriculum

Properties.Name: enrollmentDate
Properties.Description: Date when enrolled in the curriculum

Properties.Name: completionDate
Properties.Description: Date when the curriculum was completed

Properties.Name: dueDate
Properties.Description: Due date for curriculum completion

Properties.Name: itemStatusID
Properties.Description: Unique identifier for the curriculum item status

Properties.Name: curriculumID
Properties.Description: Unique identifier for the curriculum

Properties.Name: itemID
Properties.Description: Unique identifier for the curriculum item

Properties.Name: studentID
Properties.Description: Unique ID of the student/user

Properties.Name: itemTitle
Properties.Description: Title of the curriculum item

Properties.Name: completionStatus
Properties.Description: Completion status of the curriculum item

Properties.Name: completionDate
Properties.Description: Date when the curriculum item was completed (Unix timestamp)

Properties.Name: completedHours
Properties.Description: Amount of hours completed for the curriculum requirement

Properties.Name: displayOrder
Properties.Description: Order that users progress through the learning items within a curriculum

Properties.Name: globalDisplayOrder
Properties.Description: Order that this learning object is displayed in, globally, in the curriculum
